subject: feat: add PWA offline support
body:
- Add manifest.json with app metadata and icon references
- Add service worker with cache-first strategy for local assets
- Cache CDN assets (Tailwind, Chart.js, fonts) for offline use
- Add install button (appears when browser supports install)
- Add update prompt when new version available
- Add PWA meta tags to index.html

Note: Icon files (icon-192.png, icon-512.png) need to be created

https://claude.ai/code/session_018w7ThuzVv2QNHpRDmtwQDA
title: add PWA offline support
